snippet: A soft-spoken representative from Georgia who focused on the tax code and protecting the South’s textile industry, his moment in the spotlight came during the Iran-contra hearings.
abstract: Ed Jenkins, an amiable, soft-spoken representative from Georgia who nonetheless confronted one of the most prominent figures involved in the Iran-contra affair during a Congressional investigation in 1987, dies at age 78.
lead_paragraph: A soft-spoken representative from Georgia who focused on the tax code and protecting the South’s textile industry, his moment in the spotlight came during the Iran-contra hearings.

headline.seo: Ed Jenkins Dies at 78; Congressman Confronted Oliver North
headline.main: Ed Jenkins of Georgia, 78; Served in Congress 16 Years
headline.print_headline: Ed Jenkins of Georgia, 78; Served in Congress 16 Years
